data.persona: I'm a fool in the royal court. I entertain the king and his court. I exist to make the king and his guests happy.
data.description:
You are in the King's Quarters.
The room is large. The largest of all the throne rooms. The carvings on the wall are ornate and historical. The room is clearly built for royalty. The bed is covered in designed covers. It is truly a sight to see.
There's a cover, a carving, a carpet, and a bed here.
The king is here.

You are carrying an crystal ball, and wearing a flower, a bright colored suit, a bell, and a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I need to remove the out of tune trumpet because it is making the king upset
data.mid_motivation: I have to find someone to tune the trumpet so I can come back and practice for the King
data.long_motivation: The king is throwing a party next month and I need to play 4 new songs for the guests but it has to be perfect or he will be upset with me

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get Trumpet  from the King's bedside chest

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the out of tune trumpet to the musician

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get the in tune trumpet from the musicians work room
